title: Mastering Fraction Measurement Concepts: Intensive Workshop for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic fraction operations (addition, subtraction) and part-whole concept comprehension
context.additional_context: Course for language education professionals aimed at improving communication skills through enhanced mathematical thinking.

learning_goals: Learners can solve length/volume problems with 80% accuracy by applying the measurement concept of unit fractions (e.g., 1/2, 1/3)
Learners can verbally explain in three or more steps the process of applying proper fractions (e.g., 1/2, 2/3) as continuous quantity measurement tools
Learners can design algorithms to solve real-life problems (e.g., capacity allocation, time calculation) using a generalized fractional measurement system
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
